Nicaragua - Segundo Proyecto de
            Extension y Modernizacion de los Servicios de Salud :
            Evaluacion social

trustfund:
TF053140-PHRD-NICARAGUA: HEALTH SECTOR
            MODERNIZATION PROJECT (SECOND PHASE OF AN

abstracts.cdata!:
The study presents a diagnosis, based of
            user's perception, of utilization of distant health
            services in communities of difficult access, cooperation
            among level of services within the Ministry of Health
            (MINSA), network of communities, Non-government
            Organizations (NGOs), and finally, what to expect by members
            of the indigenous population of the North and South Atlantic
            region. Poverty, limited educational, traditional gender
            roles and poor access to distant health services across
            difficult terrain in remote rural areas are significant
            barriers for the development of a strategy for extension of
            health services delivery.
